DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project remove barrier obtain contraceptive method , include effective expensive method . The study seek remove financial knowledge barrier promote effective contraceptive method reduce unintended pregnancy rate population level .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 1445 year age 2 . Primary residency St. Louis City County 3 . Does desire pregnancy next 1 year 4 . Desires reversible contraception 5 . Sexually active man within past 6 month intend sex man next 6 month 6 . Is currently use contraceptive method , begin use new contraceptive method within last 4 week , current contraceptive method user want switch NEW contraceptive method immediately 7 . Willing able undergo inform consent 8 . Willing comply study protocol 2year followup schedule 9 . Not currently pregnant , meet one follow criterion : 1 . Currently pregnant , undergoing medical surgical termination pregnancy , plan postabortion contraception 2 . Currently pregnant abnormal pregnancy ( miscarriage ectopic pregnancy ) , undergo medical surgical management , plan postpregnancy contraception 3 . Currently pregnant , estimate gestational age 36 week great , plan postpartum contraception . 1 . History hysterectomy sterilization 2 . Current participation another research study would interfere conduct study
